definitions.body: cstr. [[הַלְּבֵנִים]] ´[[מ]]: Ex 5:3 (J) the tale of bricks (cf. 1.[[תּׂכֶן]]).

sf. [[בֻּנְתּוֹ]]- measurement, proportion, of ephah and bath Ez Eze 45:11; of composition of sacred oil Ex 30:32, [[תָּהּ]]- v:Ex 30:37 (P); of temple, its measurement, proportion [[תּוֹ]]- 2Ch 24:13.
